Discord.BotToken: Bot token from Discord App Page
Discord.ChatChannelID: Chat channel ID (e.g. ID of the general/galaxy chat channel)
Discord.NotificationChannelID: Notification channel ID (e.g. ID of staff chat channel)
Discord.NotificationRoleID: Notifcation role ID (e.g. ID of staff role)
Discord.NotificationUserID: If role is left blank, you can put a Discord user ID here to notify a single user
Discord.//AutoRestartTimerComment: Auto restart timer in minutes. If omitted, there will be no auto-restart. You will need forever or pm2 to use this feature.
